name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Berserk Blue Flame: Eternal Struggle Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the eternal struggle in Berserk with a blue flame backdrop in this dynamic live tab featuring sleek design and visuals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Guts' fierce battle under a blue flame, showcasing intense moments.
Minimalist Design: Clean, immersive interface for smooth browsing.

Quick Access Shortcuts: Instant access to your favorite websites.
Google Search Bar: Convenient search functionality.
More Extension: Enhance your browsing experience with extra features.
